metadata.title: CVE-2021-40403 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the pick-and-placerotation parsing functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd),and Gerbv forked 2.8.0. A specially-crafted pick-and-place file can exploitthe missing initialization of a structure to leak memory contents. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gerbv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
